text: Jed Allan (born Jed Allan Brown; March 1, 1935 - March 9, 2019) was an American actor and game show host. He was born in New York City. Allan was known for his roles on soap operas. He was best known for his role as Don Craig in Days of Our Lives, which he played from 1971 to 1985.
